attributes.action: restart the services of the dsva /dvla
attributes.additional_details: its very silly what they have done and it doesn't make any sense ... you shut down dvsa driving tests and lessons but you can see the police be in a 5 seater car with 2/3 people in the car ... i also see police in the "Tsg" with more than 6 people inside and they are not from the same house hold the covid regulations has always not been followed by the police and statistically there is 0 evidence that driving lessons will give u covid
attributes.background: because since the original lockdown march 2020 ... the government keeps cancelling tests & moving them .. this is effecting peoples mental health and jeopardises peoples chance of getting a delivery job

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
